document.full_text: the number of murder victims unearthed in mass graves in northern mexico this month has risen to 279, making it easily the worst discovery of its kind since the government began a campaign against drug cartels.
document.title: body count from mexican mass graves nears 300
lines_and_colors: the number of murder victims unearthed in mass graves in northern mexico this month has risen to 279, making it easily the worst discovery of its kind since the government began a campaign against drug cartels.
